mapper.select: SELECT a.cntr_sn, a.mlrd_cn, a.mlrd_file_id, b.cntr_ttl, (c.ctbny_pc / b.cntr_obctr * 100) as percent, b.cntr_str_dt, b.cntr_end_dt, b.cntr_obctr, c.ctbny_pc FROM tb_mlrd AS a LEFT JOIN tb_cntr AS b ON a.cntr_sn = b.cntr_sn LEFT JOIN tb_cntr_ctbny AS c ON b.cntr_sn = c.cntr_sn WHERE a.cntr_sn = #{cntr_sn}
